venue.address_1: South Fruit Street and Industrial Drive
venue.name: NH Hospital Soccer Fields

item.description:
Join me to walk for a great cause. 1 in 4 people will experience mental illness sometime in their lives. NAMI (National Alliance for Mental Illness) supports families touched by mental illness and educates the public to end the stigma. This walk is fun and festive with plenty going on along the walk route. Distance is 5K and its a great reason to get out for some exercise.

Hot dogs and hamburgers are available after the walk or we can go out for lunch.

Register to join my team or make a donation at http://namiwalks.nami.org/JoanDarragh

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Look for red car with Meetup signs near registration tents (front row of parking) or call Joan 603-305-7114
item.name: NAMI Walks Walkathon
